laboratory_examinations.findings: Several large gallstones within the gallbladder. The largest stone in the gallbladder head measures up to 3 cm. Gallbladder wall thickening up to 8 mm. Focal stripe of gallbladder wall edema and a thin layer of pericholecystic edema. No extrahepatic biliary dilatation. Common bile duct measures 6 mm. Main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow. Limited views of the kidney show a 4 cm anechoic simple cyst.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Gallbladder wall thickening up to 8 mm is new since the last evaluation.

laboratory_examinations.findings: 0.6 mg/dL, NO POLYMORPHONUCLEAR LEUKOCYTES SEEN. NO MICROORGANISMS SEEN.
